title: Membrane-immobilized transaminases for the synthesis of enantiopure amines
content:

For the manufacture of enantiopure amines, greener synthesis processes are needed. Transaminases (TAs) are able to produce chiral amines with excellent enantioselectivity and in mild conditions, and can be immobilized...
